scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:lib-react && npm run build:lib-angular && npm run build:dev-demo && npm run build:website && npm run build:lib-svelte
scripts.publish:lib: cd packages/ts && npm run build && npm run publish-dist
scripts.publish:lib-angular: cd packages/angular && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish:lib-react: cd packages/react && npm run build && npm run publish-dist
scripts.publish:lib-svelte: cd packages/svelte && npm run build && npm run publish-dist
scripts.gather-licenses: for p in packages/*; do echo "  ðŸ“„ Checking licenses for $p"; npx license-report --package=$p/package.json --config license-report-config.json --output=table > $p/licences.temp; mv -f $p/licences.temp $p/licences.txt; done
